accManagement.title: Account Management
accManagement.changePw-content: Click the button below to proceed with updating your password
accManagement.deleteAcc-content: Deleting your account will remove all information from our database. This action cannot be undone.

changeLanguage.title: Change Language
changeLanguage.content1: Choose your preferred language from the options below. This will change the language across the entire application.
changeLanguage.content2: Your current language selection will be saved automatically.

changePw.title: Change Your Password
changePw.content: To ensure the security of your account, we recommend updating your password regularly.
changePw.error-pw: Password must be at least 6 characters.
changePw.error-cfPw: Password must be the same as your new password.

deleteAcc.title: Delete Account
deleteAcc.content: Deleting your account will be remove all information from our database. this action cannot undone
deleteAcc.error-pw: Password must be at least 6 characters.

organizer.tip-info: Give some information to upgrade account to organizer.

org-view.title: Organizer Information
org-view.tip-info: Some information that upgrade account to organizer.

footer.content: Your seamless platform for event management, where creativity meets efficiency. We simplify planning, coordinate every detail, and bring your vision to life for unforgettable experiences that inspire.

buy-ticket.val-msg: Please upload your payment transaction in .jpeg, .jpg, or png

browseEvent.title: Browse Event
browseEvent.content-p: Find and join amazing events near you

create-event.title: Create Event
create-event.uploadThumbnailText: Upload an image as your thumbnail
create-event.tip-overview: Give an attractive brief paragraph about your event.
create-event.eventLink: Event Link will be required when date is comming.
create-event.tip-des: Give a short attractive and full detail description about your event.
create-event.skipAgenda: Don't have an agenda yet? You can skip this step and add it later!
create-event.tip-ticket: Set up tickets information and define ticket categories for your event.
create-event.noTicketInfo: No ticket is needed for this online event. You can continue to the next step!
create-event.tip-payment: Give a KHQR image for your payment method.
create-event.noQrInfo: No QR payment needed for free entry. You can proceed to the next step!
create-event.tip-publish: Publish your event in public or private.
create-event.publishQuestion: Is your event public or private?
create-event.sharePublish: Shared on Pruttika and search engines
create-event.sharePrivate: Shared with event link to select audience
create-event.cfPost-p1: You’ve successfully completed all the steps to create your event.
create-event.cfPost-p2: Click the submit button to finalize and publish your event.
create-event.success-content1: Success! We'll get back to you ASAP!
create-event.success-content2: Meanwhile, clean your hands often, use soap and water, or an alcohol-based hand rub, maintain a safe distance from anyone who is coughing or sneezing and always wear a mask when physical distancing is not possible.

mainpage.abt-h1: Your One-Stop Platform for All Things Events!
mainpage.abt-p: Pruttika is an innovative, user-friendly website designed to empower users with complete control over their events. From ideation to execution, Pruttika provides a comprehensive suite of tools to create events, manage tickets, and promote services effectively.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.h2-p1: We collect two types of information
policy.contentI-2: When you visit our website, subscribe to our newsletter, or interact with our services, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other details you provide.
policy.contentI-4: We may collect non-personal information such as your browser type, IP address, and usage data through cookies and other tracking technologies.
policy.h2-2: II. How We Use Your Information
policy.h2-p2: We may use the information we collect for the following purposes
policy.contentII-1: To provide, operate, and maintain our website and services.
policy.contentII-2: To improve, personalize, and expand our website's features and content.
policy.contentII-3: To communicate with you, respond to inquiries, and send updates.
policy.h2-p3: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of data transmission or storage can be guaranteed 100% secure, and we cannot ensure the absolute security of your data.
policy.h2-p4: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and gather non-personal information about website usage. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies or notify you when a cookie is being sent.
policy.h2-p5: We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering services. These providers are obligated to keep your information confidential and use it solely for the purposes for which it was provided.
policy.h2-p6: Depending on your location, you may have the right to
policy.h2-p6-1: If you would like to exercise these rights, please contact us at
policy.contentIV-1: Access and request a copy of your personal information.
policy.contentIV-2: Correct any inaccuracies in your personal data.
policy.contentIV-3: Request the deletion of your personal information.
policy.h2-7: VII. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policy.h2-p7: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the Effective Date will be updated. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
policy.h2-p8: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termOfService.title: Terms of Service
termOfService.h2-p1: Welcome to PRUTTIKA, your trusted partner for managing and organizing events efficiently. By accessing or using PRUTTIKA’s services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our platform.By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our website.
termOfService.h2-p2: PRUTTIKA provides tools for event organizers, attendees, and vendors to plan, manage, and participate in events. By using our services, you agree to: Use the platform for lawful purposes only. Avoid submitting false or misleading information during registration or event creation. Refrain from using the platform for fraudulent activities, spamming, or promoting prohibited content (e.g., violence, hate speech, or illegal goods). Respect the intellectual property rights of PRUTTIKA and other users.Our services are intended for personal and non-commercial use only. You agree not to misuse our services or engage in activities that violate applicable laws or regulations.
termOfService.content3-l1: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials. PRUTTIKA cannot be held liable for unauthorized access due to user negligence.
termOfService.content3-l2: All information provided during registration or event creation must be accurate and up-to-date. PRUTTIKA reserves the right to suspend accounts with false or incomplete information.
termOfService.content3-l3: Users must comply with all applicable local, state, and international laws and regulations while using PRUTTIKA.
termOfService.content4-l1: PRUTTIKA owns all rights to the platform’s design, code, and branding. Unauthorized copying or distribution of platform elements is prohibited.
termOfService.content4-l2: Event details, images, and other user-submitted content remain the property of the user. By submitting content to PRUTTIKA, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to display your content for promotional or operational purposes.
termOfService.h2-p5: PRUTTIKA is a platform that facilitates event management but does not guarantee: The accuracy or reliability of event details provided by organizers. The safety or success of any event listed on the platform. Users agree that PRUTTIKA is not liable for: Damages resulting from canceled or rescheduled events. Any loss of data, revenue, or reputation while using the platform.
termOfService.h2-p6: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of the website signifies your acceptance of the updated terms.
termOfService.content7-l1: PRUTTIKA may charge a service fee for certain features (e.g., ticketing). Details of fees will be displayed clearly during the transaction process.
termOfService.content7-l2: PRUTTIKA is not responsible for refunds related to events. Refunds must be handled by the event organizer based on their refund policy.
termOfService.content7-l3: In case of disputes, PRUTTIKA acts only as an intermediary and does not guarantee resolution.
termOfService.h2-p8: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at

faq.title: FAQs
faq.ans1: The event schedule, including session times and breaks, can be found on our event page.
faq.ans2: Details on any fees or free entry options can be found in the registration section.
faq.q3: What if I cannot attend after registering?
faq.ans3: Please contact us in advance if you cannot attend. This allows us to manage our participant list.
faq.q4: Can I transfer my registration to someone else?
faq.ans4: Yes, but please inform us beforehand to transfer the registration and update participant information.
faq.q5: What should I do if I experience technical difficulties?
faq.ans5: Please contact us in advance if you cannot attend. This allows us to manage our participant list.

aboutUs.introduce: We are information technology students, scholarship recipients at ANT Technology Training Center, specializing in web development.
aboutUs.gratitude1: We express our sincere gratitude to the
aboutUs.gratitude3: This invaluable opportunity has substantially alleviated the financial burdens of our educational pursuits. We are dedicated to leveraging the acquired skills to contribute meaningfully to societal advancement.
aboutUs.team1-content: A third-year student of Computer Science at the Royal University of Phnom Penh (RUPP)
aboutUs.team2-content: A third-year student of Informatics Economics at the Royal University of Law and Economics.
aboutUs.team3-content: A third-year student of Computer Science at the Royal University of Phnom Penh (RUPP)
aboutUs.team4-content: A fourth-year student of Computer Science at the Royal University of Phnom Penh (RUPP)
aboutUs.team5-content: A third-year student specializing in Information Technology (IT) at SETEC Institute .
